title: (Mon Early) Dan + Shay Blow Us Away Performing Early Hits and Their Secrets to Marriage + A Caller Has An Oddly Specific Question… + The Best Country Summer Songs of All-Time
itunes:title: (Mon Early) Dan + Shay Blow Us Away Performing Early Hits and Their Secrets to Marriage + A Caller Has An Oddly Specific Question… + The Best Country Summer Songs of All-Time
description:
Dan + Shay stop by to talk about their new song “You”, their secrets to their 5-year marriages and perform some of the early hits that are Bobby’s favorites. A caller hits us with an oddly specific question about visiting Mount Rushmore. Inside Amy's Pile, we debate what have been named as the Top 5 Country ‘Summer’ songs of all-time.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
